TopicTitle: 2 cool observations I just made on the forums

Articles.Content:
I don't think this is the right forum, but I didn't know where else to put it, so please move this thread if it is the wrong forum...

First of all, happy birthday Vexx! At the bottom of the forums main page it tells you stats like who's birthday it is.

Secondly, we are approaching 500,000 spammers denied of registration, which is weird on many levels including the fact that that is way more than the amount of scammers banned.

These are just 2 interesting things I noticed. The second one is kinda concerning though.
I would rather have 500,000 denied than 500,000 spammers banned.
Surely the second point just proves that the detection system for spammers is good, in that it doesn't allow them access in the first place, rather than retrospectively banning them.
Moved to the Kerbal Network sub-forum, where this sort of thing goes now.
